duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervises, trains, develops, and holds workgroups responsible for safety, production, and attendance in a warehouse environment.
Facilitates training with new and current warehouse employees, ensuring adherence to safety policies and procedures at all times.
Manages department resources to ensure maximum output, accuracy, and efficiency at all times.
Establishes and promotes a positive, team-oriented work environment emphasizing employee involvement, pro-active communication, and inter-departmental cooperation.
Implements employee personal development plans and ensures all department employees receive specific orientation, skills and safety training.
Implements employee personal development plans and ensures all department employees receive specific orientation, skills and safety training.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree or International equivalent - Preferred
